Package backend.objects

Class SoundPlayerAnimation

java.lang.Object
backend.PollyObject
backend.ColorfulObject
backend.Animation
backend.objects.SoundPlayerAnimation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SoundPlayerAnimation
extends Animation
Allows for sounds to be played as animations.
See Also:

    • SoundPlayerAnimation

      public SoundPlayerAnimation​(processing.core.PApplet sketch, long duration, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String extension)
      Constructor for SoundPlayerAnimation
      Parameters:
      sketch - a reference to a PApplet to allow general functionality of the processing library
      duration - the duration in milliseconds of the sound.
      startAlpha - Represents the initial visibility (0-255)
      endAlpha - Represents the final visibility (0-255)
